scripts.say: The situation is not good... although we sink two new models... but there are still a lot of signals coming towards us.
When did the Sirens become so subtle in their tactics? To be able to perfectly predict our trajectory and surround us on our operations...
Darn...if only South Dakota was here as well, then we could...
No matter what, let’s shoot our way out and carve out a blood-soaked path forward!
Prepare all cannons, aim together with me at our opponent's flagship—— open fire!
